devdoc.details: Only addresses added to the voterRegistry are able to interact

addCandidate(string).details: Candidates could have a uniqueID created before pushing for better management

params._voterAddress: The address of the account to add
params._voterName: The friendly name of the account to add, ie firstname/lastname

params._mode: Set stopped to either true or false

doVote(uint256,string).details: choiceID is index of selected candidate

getUserVotedInfo().details: ChoiceId is based on index of candidates

returns._1: uint ChoiceID of the selected vote

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
